dmca.title: clue-sticks and trademarks
dmca.body:
Hello.

I found your web site, http://www.thereisnocat.com/showme216.html has a
reference to a Clue-By-Four (tm).  Unfortunately, my company owns the
trademark to that term, and I am in the process of bringing that product to
market.  My lawyers have told me that if you do not include a "tm" (trademark
symbol) on your reference, it dilutes my trademark.

I would much rather ask you politely to remove references to Clue-by-Four(tm)
or include the "(tm) -- trademark" than have an ugly lawyerese letter sent
via certified mail, etc.


Thank you for your consideration.

[Private]
President, Intrax, Inc.
